security_warning.critical_warning: Critical security threats detected. Using PasswordEpic on this device may compromise your password security. We strongly recommend addressing these issues before continuing.

security_warning.jailbroken_device_desc: This device appears to be jailbroken. Your passwords may be at risk.
security_warning.tampering_detected_desc: The app appears to have been modified. Your passwords may be at risk.
security_warning.hook_detected_desc: A hooking framework was detected. Your passwords may be at risk.

security_audit.title: Security Audit
security_audit.select_password_to_analyze: Select a password entry to analyze its security
security_audit.desc_excellent: Outstanding security with minimal risk. Keep up the excellent security practices!
security_audit.desc_good: Strong security posture with minor improvements recommended.
security_audit.desc_fair: Moderate security level. Consider addressing the identified issues.
security_audit.desc_poor: Below average security. Immediate attention recommended.
security_audit.desc_weak: Significant vulnerabilities detected. Take action immediately.
security_audit.desc_critical: Critical security risks. Immediate password change required.
security_audit.breach_description: This password has been found in a data breach. Consider changing it immediately to protect your account.
security_audit.strength_description: Your password strength is below optimal. Consider using a stronger password with more complexity.
security_audit.security_excellent: Your security practices are excellent! Keep up the good work.
security_audit.no_recommendations: No recommendations at this time. Your password security is excellent!
security_audit.vuln_weak_password_desc: Password strength is below recommended level
security_audit.vuln_compromised_desc: This password has been found in data breaches
security_audit.vuln_duplicate_desc: This password is used in multiple accounts
security_audit.vuln_old_password_desc: Password hasn't been changed in over 90 days

security_audit.vuln_short_password_desc: Password is shorter than recommended length
security_audit.vuln_no_special_chars_desc: Add special characters for stronger security

security_audit.rec_use_generator: Use the password generator for a secure password
security_audit.rec_update_password: Update this password - it's been over 90 days
security_audit.rec_use_unique: Use a unique password for each account
security_audit.rec_add_special: Add special characters to strengthen password
security_audit.rec_increase_length: Increase password length to at least 12 characters

autofill_settings.title: Autofill Settings
autofill_settings.help_text_1: Autofill allows PasswordEpic to automatically fill your credentials in apps and websites. Your passwords are encrypted and require biometric authentication before being filled.
autofill_settings.help_text_2: To use autofill, enable the service above and grant the necessary permissions. PasswordEpic will detect login forms and offer to fill your credentials securely.
autofill_settings.autofill_enabled_success: Autofill has been enabled! You can now use PasswordEpic to fill credentials.
autofill_settings.accessibility_enabled_success: Accessibility service has been enabled! You can now use PasswordEpic accessibility features.
autofill_settings.clear_cache_message: This will clear all cached autofill data. You will need to prepare credentials again.
autofill_settings.enable_autofill_samsung_steps:
Follow these steps:

1. In Settings, tap "General management"
2. Tap "Language and input"
3. Tap "Autofill service"
4. Select "PasswordEpic"
5. Return to this app

Note: You may need to disable Samsung Pass first.
autofill_settings.enable_autofill_huawei_steps:
Follow these steps:

1. In Settings, tap "System"
2. Tap "Languages & input"
3. Tap "More input settings"
4. Tap "Autofill service"
5. Select "PasswordEpic"
6. Return to this app
autofill_settings.enable_autofill_generic_steps:
Follow these steps:

1. In Settings, look for "Autofill service"
2. Select "PasswordEpic" from the list
3. Return to this app

Common paths:
‚Ä¢ Settings ‚Üí System ‚Üí Languages & input ‚Üí Autofill
‚Ä¢ Settings ‚Üí Apps ‚Üí Default apps ‚Üí Autofill
autofill_settings.error_opening_settings: Failed to open autofill settings. Please manually enable it following the instructions above.
autofill_settings.disable_autofill_instructions:
Please select "None" or another autofill service to disable PasswordEpic as your autofill provider.

Steps:
1. Look for "Autofill service" or "Autofill" option
2. Select "None" or another autofill service
3. Return to the app when done
autofill_settings.autofill_disabled_success: Autofill has been disabled successfully. PasswordEpic is no longer your autofill service.
autofill_settings.still_enabled_message: Autofill is still enabled. Please make sure to select "None" or another service in Settings > System > Autofill service and return to the app.
autofill_settings.enable_accessibility_steps:
In the next screen:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Tap "Accessibility"
2Ô∏è‚É£ Scroll down to "Downloaded apps"
3Ô∏è‚É£ Find "PasswordEpic Autofill Refill"
4Ô∏è‚É£ Tap it
5Ô∏è‚É£ Toggle "Use PasswordEpic" ON

‚úì We'll auto-detect when you return
autofill_settings.disable_accessibility_instructions:
Please disable PasswordEpic in your accessibility settings.

Steps:
1. Go to Settings > Accessibility
2. Find "PasswordEpic" in the list
3. Toggle it OFF
4. Return to the app when done
autofill_settings.accessibility_disabled_success: Accessibility has been disabled successfully. PasswordEpic is no longer your accessibility service.
autofill_settings.accessibility_still_enabled: Accessibility is still enabled. Please make sure to toggle OFF PasswordEpic in Settings > Accessibility and return to the app.

We recommend enabling encryption to protect your passwords with your Master Password.

Are you sure you want to continue without encryption?
